------
**Citation**
If you use this tool, please cite `Pritchard, J.K., Stephens, M. and Donnelly, P., 2000. Inference of population structure using multilocus genotype data. Genetics, 155(2), pp.945-959. <http://pritchardlab.stanford.edu/structure_software/release_versions/v2.3.4/html/structure.html>`_
